text: <@UHC41680M> I run into this issue occasionally. You can use this Chrome extension, which will add a button to quickly bust the cache. This can be annoying if you're doing a lot of refreshing, so another option would be to add `?v={{ local_dt|unixtimestamp }}`to the end of the stylesheet declaration in your template. <https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/HubSpot-developer-extensi/gebemkdecnlgbcanplbgdpcffpdnfdfo>

Is there a way to set a default folder for a file/image upload in a module or even for the featured image? It'd be nice to be able to default to a specific folder on the server when the user clicks upload.
Please post this to ideas if it doesnâ€™t already exist. Great idea
